channel.title: Water to lava?
channel.description: Idk if I want lava. But I was wondering, is it possible to make it any other color? Maybe green like plasma Or black but a light black so it doesn't look like an empty space. Like on my android phone there's a live wallpaper: black plasma. It looks like a fire cape how there's dark orange and light orange both flowing. So for my water it'd be a dark and light green or a light and dark black etc etc... Any possibilities?

item.title: Water to lava?
item.dc:creator: @DavidDavidson DavidDavidson
item.description:
@DavidDavidson wrote:

well this was posted earlier and moved, check client help

Maybe green like plasma

It looks like a fire cape how there’s dark orange and light orange both flowing.
